alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:57PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips and southwestern Valley Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles west of The Pines Rec Area, or 27 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hinsdale, The Bentonite Plant and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
